Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game.assets

Class Texture

java.lang.Object
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game.assets.Texture
All Implemented Interfaces:
Asset
public class Texture extends Object implements Asset
A wrapper class for JSFML Texture objects, representing a texture asset. The source must be the path or an InputStreamto an image file. Supported formats are: BMP, DDS, JPEG, PNG, TGA and PSD. If the specified image data source is not valid (for instance, if if the specified file does not exist), the texture is replaced with a magenta-black checkboard.

  • Method Details

    • missing

      public static Texture missing()
      Returns:
      a tileable magenta-black checkboard texture typically used to indicate a texture loading error

    • apply

      public void apply(@NotNull @NotNull Shape shape)
      Applies this texture on the specified Shape. Does not affect the texture rectangle, unless the texture is set to be tileable. If shape has this texture already applied, this method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      shape - the Shape to apply this texture on

    • apply

      public void apply(@NotNull @NotNull Sprite sprite)
      Applies this texture on the specified Sprite. Does not affect the texture rectangle, unless the texture is set to be tileable. If sprite has this texture already applied, this method does nothing.1.8.
      Parameters:
      sprite - the Sprite to apply this texture on

    • isTileable

      @Contract(pure=true) public boolean isTileable()
      Returns:
      whether texture repeating is enabled for this texture

    • setTileable

      public void setTileable(boolean tileable)
      Enables or disables texture repeating. Texture repeating is disabled by default. Note that this option will be applied only
      Parameters:
      tileable - true to enable, false to disable

    • isSmooth

      @Contract(pure=true) public boolean isSmooth()
      Returns:
      whether texture smooth filter is enabled for this texture

    • setSmooth

      public void setSmooth(boolean smooth)
      Enables or disables the smooth filter. The smooth filter is disabled by default.
      Parameters:
      smooth - true to enable, false to disable

    • getSize

      @Contract(pure=true) @NotNull public @NotNull Vector2i getSize()
      Gets the dimensions of this texture.
      Returns:
      the dimensions of this texture

    • createRectangleShape

      public RectangleShape createRectangleShape(boolean originAtCenter)
      Creates a RectangleShape with this texture applied. The size of the RectangleShape matches this texture's size.
      Parameters:
      originAtCenter - whether or not the origin of the RectangleShape has to be in its center; the default value is false
      Returns:
      a RectangleShape representing this texture
